B-ORG rejects B-MISC call to boycott B-MISC lamb . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-ORG I-ORG said on Thursday it disagreed with B-MISC advice to consumers to shun B-MISC lamb until scientists determine whether mad cow disease can be transmitted to sheep . B-LOC 's representative to the B-ORG I-ORG 's veterinary committee B-PER I-PER said on Wednesday consumers should buy sheepmeat from countries other than B-LOC until the scientific advice was clearer . " We do n't support any such recommendation because we do n't see any grounds for it , " the B-ORG 's chief spokesman B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER told a news briefing . He said further scientific study was required and if it was found that action was needed it should be taken by the B-ORG I-ORG . He said a proposal last month by B-ORG Farm Commissioner B-PER I-PER to ban sheep brains , spleens and spinal cords from the human and animal food chains was a highly specific and precautionary move to protect human health . B-PER proposed B-MISC measures after reports from B-LOC and B-LOC that under laboratory conditions sheep could contract B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC ( B-MISC ) -- mad cow disease . But B-PER agreed to review his proposal after the B-ORG 's standing veterinary committee , mational animal health officials , questioned if such action was justified as there was only a slight risk to human health . B-MISC Farm Minister B-PER I-PER I-PER had earlier accused B-PER at an B-ORG farm ministers ' meeting of causing unjustified alarm through " dangerous generalisation . " . Only B-LOC and B-LOC backed B-PER 's proposal . The B-ORG 's scientific veterinary and multidisciplinary committees are due to re-examine the issue early next month and make recommendations to the senior veterinary officials . Sheep have long been known to contract scrapie , a brain-wasting disease similar to B-MISC which is believed to have been transferred to cattle through feed containing animal waste . B-MISC farmers denied on Thursday there was any danger to human health from their sheep , but expressed concern that B-MISC government advice to consumers to avoid B-MISC lamb might influence consumers across B-LOC . " What we have to be extremely careful of is how other countries are going to take B-LOC 's lead , " B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) chairman B-PER I-PER I-PER said on B-ORG I-ORG . B-LOC has led efforts to protect public health after consumer confidence collapsed in March after a B-MISC report suggested humans could contract an illness similar to mad cow disease by eating contaminated beef . B-LOC imported 47,600 sheep from B-LOC last year , nearly half of total imports . It brought in 4,275 tonnes of B-MISC mutton , some 10 percent of overall imports . Rare B-PER song draft sells for almost $ 17,000 . B-LOC 1996-08-22 A rare early handwritten draft of a song by B-LOC guitar legend B-PER I-PER was sold for almost $ 17,000 on Thursday at an auction of some of the late musician 's favourite possessions . A B-LOC restaurant paid 10,925 pounds ( $ 16,935 ) for the draft of " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC " , which B-PER penned on a piece of B-LOC hotel stationery in late 1966 . At the end of a January 1967 concert in the B-MISC city of B-LOC he threw the sheet of paper into the audience , where it was retrieved by a fan . Buyers also snapped up 16 other items that were put up for auction by B-PER 's former girlfriend B-PER I-PER , who lived with him from 1966 to 1969 . They included a black lacquer and mother of pearl inlaid box used by B-PER to store his drugs , which an anonymous B-MISC purchaser bought for 5,060 pounds ( $ 7,845 ) . The guitarist died of a drugs overdose in 1970 aged 27 . B-LOC says B-LOC spoils atmosphere for talks . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC on Thursday accused B-LOC of spoiling the atmosphere for a resumption of talks across the B-LOC I-LOC with a visit to B-LOC by B-MISC Vice President B-PER I-PER this week that infuriated B-LOC . Speaking only hours after B-MISC state media said the time was right to engage in political talks with B-LOC , B-ORG I-ORG spokesman B-PER I-PER told B-ORG : " The necessary atmosphere for the opening of the talks has been disrupted by the B-LOC authorities . " State media quoted B-LOC 's top negotiator with B-LOC , B-PER I-PER , as telling a visiting group from B-LOC on Wednesday that it was time for the rivals to hold political talks . " Now is the time for the two sides to engage in political talks ... that is to end the state of hostility , " Thursday 's overseas edition of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG quoted B-PER as saying . The foreign ministry 's B-ORG told B-ORG I-ORG in an interview he had read reports of B-PER 's comments but gave no details of why the negotiator had considered the time right for talks with B-LOC , which B-LOC considers a renegade province . B-LOC , which has long opposed all B-LOC efforts to gain greater international recognition , was infuriated by a visit to B-LOC this week by B-MISC Vice President B-PER . B-LOC says time right for B-LOC talks . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC has said it was time for political talks with B-LOC and that the rival island should take practical steps towards that goal . Consultations should be held to set the time and format of the talks , the official B-ORG news agency quoted B-PER I-PER , executive vice chairman of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , as saying late on Wednesday . B-MISC July car registrations up 14.2 pct yr / yr . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC first-time registrations of motor vehicles jumped 14.2 percent in July this year from the year-earlier period , the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said on Thursday . The office said 356,725 new cars were registered in July 1996 -- 304,850 passenger cars and 15,613 trucks . The figures represent a 13.6 percent increase for passenger cars and a 2.2 percent decline for trucks from July 1995 . Motor-bike registration rose 32.7 percent in the period . The growth was partly due to an increased number of B-MISC buying B-MISC cars abroad , while manufacturers said that domestic demand was weak , the federal office said . Almost all B-MISC car manufacturers posted gains in registration numbers in the period . B-ORG I-ORG won 77,719 registrations , slightly more than a quarter of the total . B-ORG I-ORG together with B-ORG I-ORG came in second place with 49,269 registrations , 16.4 percent of the overall figure . Third was B-ORG with 35,563 registrations , or 11.7 percent . Only B-ORG and B-ORG had fewer registrations in July 1996 compared to last year 's July . B-ORG posted 3,420 registrations compared with 5522 registrations in July a year earlier . B-ORG 's registrations fell to 554 from 643 . B-MISC SOCIALISTS GIVE GREEN LIGHT TO PM FOR ELECTIONS . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-MISC socialist party 's executive bureau gave the green light to Prime Minister B-PER I-PER to call snap elections , its general secretary B-PER I-PER told reporters . Port conditions from B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG -- B-LOC , Aug 10 - waiting time at B-LOC and B-LOC presently 24 hours . B-LOC plays down fears of war with B-LOC . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC 's outgoing peace negotiator with B-LOC said on Thursday current tensions between the two countries appeared to be a storm in a teacup . B-PER I-PER , who as B-LOC 's ambassador to B-LOC conducted unfruitful negotiations with B-LOC , told B-ORG I-ORG it looked like B-LOC wanted to talk rather than fight . " It appears to me the B-MISC priority is still to negotiate . The B-MISC are confused , they are definitely tense , but the general assessment here in B-LOC is that this is essentially a storm in a teacup , " he said . B-PER is winding up his term as ambassador . He will be replaced by B-PER I-PER , a former B-MISC envoy to B-LOC and right-wing B-ORG party politician . B-LOC on Wednesday sent B-LOC a message , via B-LOC , saying it was committed to peace and wanted to open negotiations without preconditions . But it slammed B-LOC for creating what it called a dangerous atmosphere . B-LOC accused B-LOC on Wednesday of launching a hysterical campaign against it after B-MISC television reported that B-LOC had recently test fired a missile . It said its arms purchases were for defensive purposes . " The message that we sent to ( B-MISC President B-PER I-PER ) B-PER is that B-LOC is ready at any time without preconditions to enter peace negotiations , " B-MISC Foreign Minister B-PER I-PER told B-ORG I-ORG in an interview . Tension has mounted since B-MISC Prime Minister B-PER I-PER took office in June vowing to retain the B-LOC I-LOC B-LOC captured from B-LOC in the 1967 B-LOC I-LOC war . B-MISC peace talks have been deadlocked over the B-LOC since 1991 despite the previous government 's willingness to make B-LOC concessions . Peace talks between the two sides were last held in February . " The voices coming out of B-LOC are bad , not good . The media ... are full of expressions and declarations that must be worrying ... this artificial atmosphere is very dangerous because those who spread it could become its prisoners , " B-PER said . " We expect from B-LOC , if its face is to peace , that it will answer B-LOC 's message to enter peace negotiations because that is our goal , " he said . " We do not want a war , B-PER forbid . No one benefits from wars . " B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG television said B-LOC had sent a " calming signal " to B-LOC . It gave no source for the report . B-PER and B-PER 's spokesmen said they could not confirm it . The television also said that B-PER had sent messages to reassure B-LOC via B-LOC , the B-LOC I-LOC and B-LOC . B-MISC diplomat denies nurses stranded in B-LOC . B-LOC 1996-08-22 A B-MISC diplomat on Thursday denied a B-MISC tabloid report this week that B-LOC was refusing exit visas to 100 B-MISC nurses trying to return home after working in the B-MISC I-MISC country . " This is not true . Up to today , we have no knowledge of any nurse stranded or kept in B-LOC without her will , and we have not received any complaint , " the B-MISC embassy 's charge d'affaires in B-LOC , B-PER I-PER , told B-ORG by telephone . B-LOC 's labour ministry said this week it would send a team to B-LOC to investigate , but B-PER said the probe was prompted by some nurses complaining about their work conditions such as non-payment of their salaries . He said that there are an estimated 800 B-MISC nurses working in B-LOC . Two B-MISC opposition leaders meet in B-LOC . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-22 An B-MISC exile group based in B-LOC vowed on Thursday to extend support to B-LOC 's B-MISC rebels after they were attacked by B-MISC troops deep inside B-LOC last month . A B-ORG I-ORG statement said its leader B-PER I-PER met in B-LOC the Secretary-General of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) B-PER I-PER on Wednesday and voiced his support to B-LOC 's rebel B-MISC . " B-MISC emphasised that the B-MISC B-ORG would continue to stand side by side with their B-MISC compatriots and the resistance movement in B-LOC I-LOC , " it said . A spokesman for the group said the meeting " signals a new level of cooperation between B-ORG I-ORG and the B-MISC I-MISC oppositions " . B-LOC heavily bombarded targets in northern B-LOC in July in pursuit of B-ORG guerrillas based in B-MISC I-MISC areas outside the control of the government in B-LOC . B-MISC I-MISC areas bordering B-LOC are under the control of guerrillas of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) group . B-ORG and B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) the two main B-MISC I-MISC factions , have had northern B-LOC under their control since B-MISC forces were ousted from B-LOC in the 1991 B-MISC I-MISC . Clashes between the two parties broke out at the weekend in the most serious fighting since a B-MISC ceasefire last year . B-ORG I-ORG said B-MISC troops had also been shelling B-ORG positions in B-LOC region in B-LOC province near the B-MISC border over the last two days . It said about 100 B-MISC I-MISC were killed or wounded in the attack . Both B-LOC and B-LOC mount air and land strikes at targets in northern B-LOC in pursuit of their own B-MISC rebels . A B-MISC air force in southern B-LOC protects B-MISC I-MISC from possible attacks by B-LOC troops . B-MISC riyal rates steady in quiet summer trade . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The spot B-MISC riyal against the dollar and riyal interbank deposit rates were mainly steady this week in quiet summer trade , dealers in the kingdom said . " There were no changes in B-MISC riyal rates . The market was very quiet because of summer holidays , " one dealer said . The spot riyal was put at 3.7504 / 06 to the dollar . B-MISC interbank deposits were at 5-1/2 , 3/8 percent , three months were 5-5/8 , 1/2 percent and six months were 5-3/4 , 5/8 percent . B-MISC funds were at six , 5-7/8 percent . B-LOC approves B-PER 's flight to B-LOC I-LOC . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC gave B-MISC President B-PER I-PER permission on Thursday to fly over its territory to the B-LOC I-LOC , ending a brief B-MISC crisis , an B-PER adviser said . " The problem is over . The president 's aircraft has received permission to pass through B-MISC airspace but the president is not expected to travel to the B-LOC I-LOC before Monday , " B-PER I-PER I-PER told B-ORG . B-PER had been scheduled to meet former B-MISC prime minister B-PER I-PER in the B-LOC I-LOC town of B-LOC on Thursday but the venue was changed to B-LOC after B-LOC denied flight clearance to the B-MISC leader 's helicopters . B-MISC officials accused right-wing Prime Minister B-PER I-PER of trying to stop the B-LOC meeting by keeping B-PER grounded . B-PER subsequently cancelled a meeting between B-MISC and B-ORG officials , on civilian affairs , at the B-LOC I-LOC crossing between B-LOC and the B-LOC I-LOC . B-PER I-PER said B-PER had decided against flying to the B-LOC I-LOC on Thursday , after B-LOC lifted the ban , because he had a busy schedule in B-LOC and would not be free until Monday . B-MISC B-LOC embassy says B-MISC guards going home . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-22 Three B-MISC guards brought to the B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC last week by B-MISC hostages who escaped from the B-MISC militia will return to B-LOC in a few days , the B-MISC embassy in B-LOC I-LOC said on Thursday . " Our ambassador is in touch with the B-LOC foreign ministry . Their return to B-LOC will take place in two or three days , " an embassy official said . " The embassy is issuing them travel documents for their return to their homeland . There is no objection to their travel , " he added . The three B-MISC I-MISC guards were overpowered by seven B-MISC aircrew who escaped to B-LOC state B-LOC last Friday on board their own aircraft after a year in the captivity of B-MISC militia in B-LOC in southern B-LOC . The B-LOC said on Monday it would hand over the three to the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , possibly last Tuesday . It has since been silent on the issue . When asked whether the three guards would travel back to B-LOC or the B-MISC capital B-LOC , the embassy official said : " That has not been decided , but possibly B-LOC . " B-LOC is the headquarters of the opposition B-MISC militia . B-LOC is controlled by President B-PER I-PER 's government , which B-MISC is fighting to overthrow . The embassy official said the three men , believed to be in their 20s , were currently in B-LOC I-LOC . He did not elaborate . The B-MISC , working for the B-ORG firm in the B-MISC republic of B-LOC , were taken hostage after a B-MISC B-MISC fighter forced their cargo plane to land in August 1995 . B-MISC said its shipment of ammunition from B-LOC was evidence of B-MISC military support for B-PER 's government . B-LOC said the crew 's nationality was coincidental . Numerous diplomatic attempts to free the seven failed . The B-MISC , who said they overpowered the guards -- two armed with B-MISC automatic rifles -- while doing regular maintenance work on their B-MISC I-MISC cargo plane last Friday , left the B-LOC capital B-LOC I-LOC for home on Sunday . B-LOC 's B-PER meets B-LOC 's B-PER . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC President B-PER I-PER has told visiting B-MISC ultra-nationalist B-PER I-PER that B-LOC wanted to maintain " friendship and cooperation " with B-LOC , official B-MISC newspapers said on Thursday . " President B-PER I-PER stressed during the meeting B-LOC 's keenness to maintain friendship and cooperation with B-LOC , " the papers said . They said B-PER told B-PER before he left B-LOC on Wednesday that his B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG and the B-MISC B-ORG ( parliament ) " are calling for an immediate lifting of the embargo " imposed on B-LOC after its 1990 invasion of B-LOC . B-PER said on Tuesday he would press the B-MISC government to help end B-ORG trade sanctions on B-LOC and blamed B-LOC for delaying establishment of good ties with B-LOC . " Our stand is firm , namely we are calling on ( the B-MISC ) government to end the economic embargo on B-LOC and resume trade ties between B-LOC and B-LOC , " he told reporters . B-PER visited B-LOC twice in 1995 . Last October he was invited to attend the referendum held on B-LOC 's presidency , which extended B-PER 's term for seven more years . Outlook for a bullish cattle-on-feed report is also expected to lend support and prompt some bull spreading , analysts said . However , trade will likely be light and prices could drift on evening up ahead of the report . B-LOC 1996-08-22 Three plugged water injection wells on the B-LOC oilfield off B-MISC will be reopened over the next month , operator B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) said on Thursday . The plugged wells have accounted for a dip of 30,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) in B-LOC output to roughly 220,000 bpd , according to the company 's B-ORG I-ORG newsletter . The wells will be reperforated and gravel will be pumped into the reservoir through one of the wells to avoid plugging problems in the future , it said . -- B-LOC newsroom +47 22 42 50 41 B-MISC April trade surplus 3.8 billion markka - B-ORG . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC 's trade surplus rose to 3.83 billion markka in April from 3.43 billion in March , the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) said in a statement on Thursday . The value of exports fell one percent year-on-year in April and the value of imports fell two percent , B-ORG said . The B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG earlier estimated the April trade surplus at 3.2 billion markka with exports projected at 14.5 billion and imports at 11.3 billion . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-ORG I-ORG raised the price for tap sales of the B-MISC government 's new 5.75 percent bond due September 2002 to 99.95 from 99.90 . Tap sales began on Monday and are being held daily from 07.00 B-MISC to 15.00 B-MISC until further notice . The ministry had raised 2.3 billion guilders from sales of the new bond by the close of trade on Wednesday . -- B-LOC newsroom +31 20 504 5000 B-MISC farm ministry tells consumers to avoid B-MISC mutton . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG suggested on Wednesday that consumers avoid eating meat from B-MISC sheep until scientists determine whether mad cow disease can be transmitted to the animals . " Until this is cleared up by the B-ORG I-ORG 's scientific panels -- and we have asked this to be done as quickly as possible -- ( consumers ) should if at all possible give preference to sheepmeat from other countries , " ministry official B-PER I-PER told B-ORG television . " I do not want to say that there is a concrete danger for consumers , " he added . " There are too many holes in what we know , and these must be filled very quickly . " B-LOC has led efforts to ensure consumer protection tops the list of priorities in dealing with the mad cow crisis , which erupted in March when B-LOC acknowledged humans could contract a similar illness by eating contaminated beef . The B-ORG I-ORG agreed this month to rethink a proposal to ban the use of suspect sheep tissue after some B-ORG veterinary experts questioned whether it was justified . B-ORG Farm Commissioner B-PER I-PER had proposed banning sheep brains , spleens and spinal cords from the human and animal food chains after reports from B-LOC and B-LOC that under laboratory conditions sheep could contract B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC ( B-MISC ) -- mad cow disease . But some members of the B-ORG 's standing veterinary committee questioned whether the action was necessary given the slight risk to human health . The question is being studied separately by two B-ORG scientific committees . Sheep have long been known to contract scrapie , a similar brain-wasting disease to B-MISC which is believed to have been transferred to cattle through feed containing animal waste . B-MISC officials say sheep meat is perfectly safe to eat . B-ORG said B-LOC imported 47,600 sheep from B-LOC last year , nearly half of total imports . It brought in 4,275 tonnes of B-MISC mutton , some 10 percent of overall imports . After the B-MISC government admitted a possible link between mad cow disease and its fatal human equivalent , the B-ORG imposed a worldwide ban on B-MISC beef exports . B-ORG leaders agreed at a summit in June to a progressive lifting of the ban as B-LOC takes parallel measures to eradicate the disease . GOLF - SCORES AT B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC . B-PER HORSE RACING - B-PER ENDS 25-YEAR WAIT FOR TRAINER B-PER . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-22 Sir B-PER I-PER landed his first group one victory in 25 years as a trainer when his top sprinter B-PER , a 100-30 chance , won the B-MISC I-MISC on Thursday . The three-year-old , partnered by veteran B-PER I-PER , snatched a short head verdict in the last stride to deny B-PER ( 16-1 ) , trained by B-PER I-PER and ridden by B-PER I-PER . B-PER I-PER I-PER ( 11-4 ) , last year 's B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC winner at B-LOC , finished third , a further one and a quarter lengths away with the 7-4 favourite B-PER I-PER in fourth . B-PER , a B-PER I-PER winner in June , may now be aimed at this season 's B-MISC , B-LOC 's top sprint race . B-PER , reluctant to go into the winner 's enclosure until the result of the photo-finish was announced , said : " Twenty-five years and I have never been there so I thought I had better wait a bit longer . " He added : " It 's very sad to beat B-PER I-PER because I am godfather to his daughter . " Like B-PER , B-PER I-PER , trainer of B-PER I-PER , had gone into Thursday 's race in search of a first group one success after many years around the top of his profession . B-PER said : " I`m disappointed but I do n't feel suicidal . He ( B-PER I-PER ) was going as well as any of them one and a half furlongs ( 300 metres ) out but he just did n't quicken . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-PER I-PER spoke on Thursday of his sadness at leaving B-ORG , the club he led to the B-MISC premier league title in 1994-95 . B-ORG announced on Wednesday they and B-PER had parted by mutual consent . But the ex-manager confessed on Thursday to being " sad " at leaving after taking B-ORG from the second division to the premier league title inside three and a half years . In a telephone call to a local newspaper from his holiday home in B-LOC , B-PER said : " We came to the same opinion , albeit the club came to it a little bit earlier than me . " He added : " If no one asked , I never opened my mouth . I have stayed out of the way and let them get on with the job . The club thought it ( the job ) had run its course and I came to the same conclusion . " B-PER had been with B-ORG for nearly five years , first as manager and then , for the past 15 months , as director of football . CRICKET - B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC SCORES . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC B-MISC I-MISC captain B-PER I-PER on Thursday signalled his possible resignation if his team loses an away tie against B-LOC next month . The former B-MISC champion said the immediate future of B-LOC 's B-MISC I-MISC coach B-PER I-PER could also be determined by events in B-LOC . " If we lose this one , B-PER and I will have to have a good look at giving someone else a go , " B-PER was quoted as saying in B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG newspaper . B-LOC face B-LOC in the world group qualifying tie on clay from September 20-22 . Under B-PER 's leadership , B-LOC were relegated from the elite world group last year , the first time the 26-time B-MISC I-MISC winners had slipped from the top rank . Since taking over as captain from B-PER I-PER in 1994 , B-PER 's record in tandem with B-PER , his former doubles partner , has been three wins and three losses . B-PER has selected B-MISC semifinalist B-PER I-PER , B-PER I-PER , B-PER I-PER , and B-MISC doubles champions B-PER I-PER and B-PER I-PER to face the B-MISC . The home side boasts world number six B-PER I-PER , and B-PER conceded his players would be hard-pressed to beat the B-MISC number one . " We are ready to fight to our last breath -- B-LOC must play at its absolute best to win , " said B-PER , who described the tie as the toughest he has faced as captain . B-LOC last won the B-MISC I-MISC in 1986 , but they were beaten finalists against B-LOC three years ago under B-PER 's guidance . BADMINTON - B-MISC I-MISC RESULTS . B-PER I-PER ( B-LOC ) BASEBALL - B-ORG ' MANAGER B-PER I-PER HOSPITALIZED . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-ORG I-ORG manager B-PER I-PER will miss Thursday night 's game against the B-ORG I-ORG after being admitted to a hospital with an irregular heartbeat . The 53-year-old B-PER was hospitalized after experiencing dizziness . " He is in no danger and will be treated and observed this evening , " said B-ORG team physician Dr. B-PER I-PER , adding that B-PER is expected to be released on Friday . B-ORG ' bench coach B-PER I-PER will manage the club in B-PER 's absence . B-PER is the second manager to be hospitalized this week after B-ORG I-ORG skipper B-PER I-PER was admitted to B-LOC I-LOC 's B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC on Wednesday with a blood clot in his left calf . B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG to appeal payment denial . B-LOC , B-LOC . 1996-08-22 B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said on Thursday it will appeal to the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG in B-LOC a decision by the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) that denied reimbursement of certain costs under B-MISC . The B-ORG Administrator reversed a previously favorable decision regarding the reimbursement of costs related to the company 's community liaison personnel , it added . The company said it continues to believe the majority of the community liaison costs are coverable under the terms of the B-MISC program . " We are disappointed with the administrator 's decision but we continue to be optimistic regarding an ultimate favorable resolution , " B-PER I-PER , chief executive officer , said in a statement . B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said it previously recorded a reserve equal to 16 percent of all revenue related to the community liaison costs . Separately , B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG in B-LOC ruled in its favor regarding the reimbursement of certain interest expenses . This decision will result in the reimbursement by B-MISC of $ 81,000 in disputed costs . " This is our first decision in federal distrct court regarding a dispute with B-MISC , " B-PER said . " We are extremely pleased with this decision and we recognize it as a significant step toward resolution of our outstanding B-MISC disputes . B-ORG sees Q2 loss similar to Q1 loss . B-LOC , B-LOC . 1996-08-22 B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG Chairman and Chief Executive B-PER I-PER said Thursday he expected the company 's second-quarter results to be similar to the $ 34.6 million loss posted in the first quarter . He also told B-ORG before the retailer 's annual meeting that the second quarter could be better than the first quarter ended May 4 . " We could do even better , " he said . The second-quarter results are expected to be released in September . B-PER said seeking bankruptcy protection was not under consideration . B-ORG emerged from B-MISC I-MISC bankruptcy protection in June 1994 after 3-1/2 years . " Bankruptcy is always possible , particularly when you lose what we are going to lose in the first half of this year , " B-PER said . " But this is not something we are striving to do . " The B-MISC retailer lost $ 95.7 million in the fiscal year ended February 3 . That was the second-largest loss in the company 's history . B-PER said that B-ORG planned to open two new stores this fall . The company announced in March that it was closing seven stores and backing out of nine new lease agreements . At the time , B-ORG said it did not plan to open any new stores this fall . It currently operates 169 stores in 23 states . For last year 's second quarter , which ended July 29 , 1995 , B-ORG posted a loss of $ 7.1 million , or $ 0.23 per share , on sales of $ 311.9 million . Measles exposure can lead to bowel disease - study . B-LOC 1996-08-23 Women who get measles while pregnant may have babies at higher risk of B-PER 's disease , a debilitating bowel disorder , researchers said on Friday . Three out of four B-MISC babies born to mothers who caught measles developed serious cases of B-PER 's disease , the researchers said . Dr B-PER I-PER of the B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC and colleagues screened 25,000 babies delivered at B-LOC I-LOC , B-LOC , between 1940 and 1949 . Four of the mothers had measles while pregnant . " Three of the four children had B-PER 's disease , " B-PER 's group wrote in the B-ORG medical journal . B-PER 's is an inflammation of the bowel that can sometimes require surgery . It causes diarrhoea , abdominal pain and weight loss . The researchers said the three children involved had especially severe cases . Exposure to viruses can often cause birth defects . Most notably , women who get rubella ( B-MISC measles ) have a high risk of a stillborn baby . All the key numbers - B-ORG August industrial trends . Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to inspection , survey or other conditions . Garlic pills do n't lower cholesterol , study finds . B-LOC 1996-08-22 Garlic pills may not lower blood cholesterol and studies that show they do may be flawed , B-MISC researchers have reported . A study by a team of doctors at B-ORG I-ORG has found people with high blood cholesterol do not benefit significantly from taking garlic tablets . The study involved 115 people with high blood cholesterol levels . They were given 900 milligrams a day of dried garlic powder or placebo tablets . " There were no significant differences between the groups receiving garlic and placebo , " they wrote in the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG . Those taking part were told to eat a low-fat diet for six weeks before they started taking the pills , and their blood cholesterol measured before and after the six-week period . The researchers said this would make their findings more accurate . Several studies have found garlic pills can lower blood pressure and blood cholesterol . But the B-LOC team disputed these findings and said either previous trials may have been interpreted incorrectly , those taking part were not given special diets beforehand or the duration of the studies may have been too short . The six-month trial was funded by the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG and B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , which makes B-MISC brand garlic tablets . The study did not address whether whole garlic could affect cholesterol . -- B-ORG I-ORG +44 171 542 7950 B-LOC gives aid to volcano-hit B-LOC island . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC said on Thursday it would give 25 million pounds ( $ 39 million ) of development aid to the B-LOC island of B-LOC , where much of the population living in the south has fled to avoid a volcano . The volcano in the Soufriere hills has erupted three times in the past 13 months and last April some 4,500 people living in the capital , B-ORG , and southern areas were evacuated to the north , where many are living in public shelters and schools . " This assistance will provide a fast track development programme for the designated ( northern ) safe area , " B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said in a statement . B-LOC gave 8.5 million pounds ( $ 13 million ) to B-LOC , which is one of its dependent territories , when the volcano first became active . Overseas Development Minister B-PER I-PER said a recent census had shown most B-MISC wanted to remain on the island . " The development of the north will help them to do just that , " she said . B-LOC 1996-08-21 Top-seeded B-PER I-PER of B-LOC was beaten 6-3 7-5 by 123rd-ranked B-PER I-PER of B-LOC on Wednesday in his first match of the $ 2 million B-MISC I-MISC . A lefthander with a strong serve , B-PER kept the rallies short by constantly attacking the net and the tactic worked in the second-round match against B-PER , playing his first match after receiving a first-round bye along with the other top eight seeds . The tournament also lost its second seed on the third day of play when second-seeded B-PER I-PER of B-LOC was beaten 6-7(3-7 ) 6-4 6-4 by unseeded B-PER I-PER of B-LOC . Other seeded players advancing were number three B-PER I-PER of B-LOC I-LOC , number four B-PER I-PER of B-LOC , number six B-PER I-PER of the B-LOC I-LOC and B-MISC B-PER I-PER , the seventh seeed . Eighth seed B-PER I-PER of B-LOC was eliminated in a one hour , 55 minute battle by unseeded B-PER I-PER of B-LOC . B-PER saved a match point at 5-6 in the third-set tie break before winning 6-3 3-6 7-6 ( 8-6 ) . B-PER 's compatriot , 13th seed B-PER I-PER , was not as fortunate . He held one match point at 9-8 in a marathon third-set tie break but was beaten 5-7 7-6 ( 7-1 ) 7-6 ( 13-11 ) by unseeded B-PER I-PER of the B-LOC I-LOC . " I knew I had to serve well and keep the points short and that 's what I was able to do , " said B-PER , who ranks 10th in doubles . There were only two service breaks in the match . The lanky B-MISC broke B-PER at 4-3 in the first set and 5-5 in the second before ending the match on his third match point when the B-MISC hit a service return long . " I probably did n't hit five ground strokes in the whole match , " said B-PER , only partly joking . " The way he was chipping and charging and serving and volleying I did n't really get my timing playing from the baseline . " " He played a good match , took a few chances , and every time he was down he was able to come up with a big first serve . " Playing at night was not B-PER 's preference . " I asked for a day match and they gave me a night match , " he said . " I do n't like playing under the lights but maybe it would not have made any difference . " B-PER rallied from a 2-5 deficit in the first set but then played erratically against the 44th-ranked B-PER , who was a surprise winner over his famous compatriot B-PER I-PER in the second round at B-LOC . B-PER hit 32 aces but was outplayed from the back court by the 24-year-old B-PER . The sixth-ranked B-PER , who lost in the final at B-LOC to world number one B-PER I-PER of the B-LOC last Sunday , made a quick getaway after his loss but did say : " Something was not there when I arrived ( in B-LOC ) . I did n't feel good . And I did n't have a good feeling as soon as I lost in my doubles ( on Tuesday ) . " " I thought he looked a little unfocused at certain times on his ground strokes , " said B-PER . The 19-year-old B-PER , who beat B-PER in the third round of this year 's B-MISC I-MISC , stayed calm in a nervy third-set tie break against B-PER . " I 'm pleased because I did n't play that great today , but I fought really well , " he said . " When I was down 2-5 in the tiebreak ( in the third set ) , I just thought about winning my two serves and hoped that he might get tight . B-LOC 1996-08-22 An outbreak of cholera has killed five people in the central B-LOC town of B-LOC , where health authorities have recorded 291 cases since August 11 , a medical official said on Thursday . Doctor B-PER I-PER said medical staff were overwhelmed with work . " People are rushing to the hospital as soon as the first symptoms appear , that 's why we have fewer deaths , " he told B-ORG by telephone from the town , 160 km ( 100 miles ) southeast of the B-MISC capital B-LOC . B-MISC general takes over B-LOC B-ORG force . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC Major General B-PER I-PER I-PER took over on Thursday as commander of the B-ORG peacekeeping force in B-LOC , two days after the start of the latest ceasefire in the six-year civil war . B-PER replaced another B-MISC major general , B-PER I-PER , who told officers at the handover ceremony that peace was now at hand for B-LOC after six years of fighting and more than a dozen failed accords . " The search for peace in B-LOC has been difficult , challenging and sometimes painful . Peacekeepers were harassed , killed and taken hostage , " he said . " It is difficult but I want to assure you that peace is in sight . " B-ORG I-ORG military observers travelling to the western town of B-LOC on Wednesday to monitor the ceasefire were delayed by shooting along the highway , B-ORG special representative B-PER I-PER said . They finally went ahead with an escort from the B-ORG faction . Faction leaders who agreed a new peace deal in the B-MISC capital B-LOC on Saturday have accused each other of breaking the ceasefire . The latest peace deal foresees the disarmament of an estimated 60,000 combatants and sets a target date of May 30 next year for elections . The B-ORG force , currently 10,000 strong , was sent to B-LOC by the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG in 1990 at the height of the fighting . B-LOC calls two days of prayer . A government statement , broadcast repeatedly by state radio , said the two days of prayer were " for the dead , for peace and prosperity in B-LOC , the victory of the new government and the health of the head of state " . The precise reason for the call was not immediately clear . B-MISC reading sessions and prayers were to be held in the farming town of B-LOC , near his home about 60 km ( 40 miles ) from the capital B-LOC . B-PER , an army general , survived a February army pay revolt which at the time he described as a veiled attempt to topple him . He has since named a prime minister for the first time since early in his rule and ordered a crackdown on corruption . B-LOC 1996-08-22 At least 50 B-MISC servicemen have been killed in a battle with separatist rebels which erupted in the B-MISC capital B-LOC on Thursday and continued after B-LOC and the rebels agreed a truce , B-ORG news agency said . B-ORG quoted B-MISC military command in B-LOC as saying that about 200 B-ORG I-ORG forces , sent on reconaisance mission , clashed with rebels at B-LOC I-LOC . The B-ORG report could not be independently confirmed . B-LOC peacemaker B-PER I-PER and rebel chief-of-staff B-PER I-PER signed an agreement earlier on Thursday under which the two sides would cease all hostilities at noon ( 0800 B-MISC ) on Friday . B-ORG made clear that the B-ORG I-ORG detachment had been sent on the mission before the truce deal had been signed at the local equivalent of 1500 B-MISC . But fierce fighting still raged at 1600 B-MISC , B-ORG said . It quoted a source in the B-MISC command in B-LOC as saying that the servicemen were outnumbered by the rebels . B-MISC schoolgirl blackmailer wanted textbooks . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-22 A B-MISC schoolgirl blackmailed two women with anonymous letters threatening death and later explained that she needed money for textbooks , police said on Thursday . " The 13-year-old girl tried to extract 60 and 70 zlotys ( $ 22 and $ 26 ) from two residents of B-LOC by threatening to take their lives , " a police spokesman said in the nearby northern city of B-LOC on Thursday . He said the women reported the blackmail letters and police caught the girl on Wednesday as she tried to pick up the cash at the B-LOC railway station . " Interviewed in the presence of a psychologist , she said she wanted to use the money for school books and clothes , " spokesman B-PER I-PER told B-ORG . He said the case of the girl , from a poor family that had never been in trouble with the law , would go before a special court dealing with underage offenders . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-22 The city of B-LOC , pounded by B-MISC planes and artillery for hours on Wednesday , calmed down overnight , although sporadic explosions and shooting could still be heard . A couple of helicopters flew over the city early on Thursday morning , but did not appear to be firing at anything . Boat passengers rescued off B-MISC coast . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG on Thursday rescued 12 people lost for three days in an open boat off the B-LOC coast , officials said . The boat had been missing since Monday afternoon when it left the tiny island of B-LOC off B-LOC 's southwest coast with sightseers for a return trip to B-LOC province , near the border with B-LOC . The boat ran out of fuel and did not have a radio to call for help , B-ORG spokesman Lt. B-PER I-PER said . He said 11 passengers and one boatman survived on coconuts and rainwater during 65 hours lost at sea . The boat was towed to the port city of B-LOC . B-MISC July raw steel output up 14.8 pct vs ' 95 . B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC raw steel output was 355,900 tonnes in July , 14.8 percent higher than in July 1995 and up 1.9 percent from June , B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said Thursday . Primary iron output was 297,700 tonnes , 14.5 percent more than last July and 0.1 percent more than in June . Hot laminate production was 349,000 tonnes , 3.2 percent up from July 1995 and 0.8 percent up from June . Production of cold laminates was 120,500 tonnes , 4.2 percent higher than the same month last year and 11 percent higher than in June . -- B-PER I-PER , B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG +541 318-0655 B-LOC 's guerrillas kill one , take 8 hostage in jungle . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-21 B-MISC guerrillas killed one man and took eight people hostage after taking over a village in the country 's northeastern jungle region , anti- terrorist police sources said on Wednesday . For three hours on Tuesday , around 100 members of the B-MISC rebel group B-ORG I-ORG took control of B-LOC I-LOC , a small village about 345 miles ( 550 km ) northeast of B-LOC , the sources said . Some guerrillas made villagers listen to propaganda speeches in the village centre , others forced passing motorists out of their cars and daubed their vehicles with slogans . By Wednesday , the whereabouts of the eight hostages was still not known , the sources said . In recent months the B-ORG I-ORG , severely weakened since the 1992 capture of its leader B-PER I-PER , has been stepping up both its military and propaganda activities . B-LOC 's guerrilla conflicts have cost at least 30,000 lives and $ 25 billion in damage to infrastructure since 1980 . Former B-LOC rebel leader held after shooting . B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-21 Flamboyant former B-MISC rebel leader B-PER I-PER was in custody on Wednesday charged with attempted murder , police said . B-PER turned himself into police after B-PER I-PER , a B-MISC visitor from the B-LOC , accused B-PER of trying to kill him on Sunday after a bar-room brawl in the small mining town of B-LOC , about 56 miles ( 90 km ) east of B-LOC , said police spokesman B-PER I-PER . B-PER , showing cuts and bruises on his face , told reporters the former head of the feared B-ORG I-ORG had tried and failed to shoot him after B-PER objected to B-PER 's advances toward his wife . B-PER said B-PER then ordered his bodyguards to beat him up . B-PER , 35 , denied the charges and said he had merely defended himself when B-PER attacked him with a bottle . It was the second time B-PER had been charged with attempted murder in less than two years . In 1994 he served two months in prison for shooting a thief in the buttocks . B-PER led a rebel group of about 1,000 in a 1986 uprising against the regime of military strongman B-PER I-PER . The conflict , which killed more than 500 and caused thousands to flee to neighbouring B-LOC I-LOC in the late 1980s , eventually paved the way to democratic elections in 1991 . Despite numerous problems with authorities , B-PER went on to become a successful businessman with mining and logging interests . He also manages and occasionally plays for one of the leading local soccer teams . Noisy saw leads B-MISC police to heroin hideaway . B-LOC 1996-08-22 A B-LOC I-LOC carpenter was arrested in the B-MISC seaside town of B-LOC after police seized 18 kg ( 39.7 pounds ) of heroin following complaints by residents of a noisy saw , police said on Thursday . B-PER I-PER I-PER , 40 , was arrested late on Wednesday after police searched a house and found heroin in bags and hidden in hollow spaces in wooden planks , police said . The suspect said he was hired to make a wooden box from the planks in order to hide the heroin . Police went to the house after receiving complaints of sawing during the night over the course of several days . When they arrived to investigate , police saw people escaping from the back door so they decided to search the house . The seized heroin has an estimated street value of about 300 million baht ( $ 12 million ) , police said . Officials are now hunting for the suspect 's collaborators , police said . B-PER was being detained pending formal charges , police said . B-LOC foreign minister arrives in B-LOC . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC Foreign Minister B-PER I-PER arrived in B-LOC on Thursday for a four-day visit that follows rising friction between the two nations in recent weeks . B-PER was to meet B-MISC Foreign Minister B-PER I-PER and sign an agreement on an B-MISC consulate in B-LOC I-LOC , an official of the B-MISC embassy in B-LOC said . B-LOC will resume sovereignty over B-LOC I-LOC , a B-MISC colony , in mid-1997 . Relations between B-LOC and B-LOC have been strained in recent weeks because of B-LOC 's plan to sell uranium to B-LOC 's rival B-LOC . Other issues affecting ties include plans by an B-MISC cabinet minister to visit B-LOC , a security pact between B-LOC and B-LOC and a possible visit to B-LOC next month by B-LOC 's exiled spiritual leader the B-PER I-PER . B-PER is the first B-MISC minister to visit B-LOC since the new conservative government took office in B-LOC in March . B-MISC accuse B-ORG of banning books . B-LOC , B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 A B-LOC I-LOC bookseller charged on Thursday that the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG has forced him to sign an undertaking not to distribute books written by critics of B-MISC self-rule deals . " They made me sign an undertaking not to sell the books to anyone at the risk of legal action . One official told me ' you have to either destroy the books or return them to B-LOC ' , " B-PER I-PER , owner of the B-MISC B-LOC bookshop , told B-ORG . He said ministry officials made him sign this a few weeks ago after he brought about a dozen copies from B-LOC of a book by B-PER I-PER , a prominent scholar at B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC 's B-ORG I-ORG . B-PER , a B-LOC citizen of B-MISC origin , has been an outspoken critic of the 1993 B-MISC self-rule deal and has written at least two books on the accord . On Wednesday a bookseller in the B-LOC I-LOC town of B-LOC said police about a month ago confiscated several copies of two of B-PER 's books on the B-MISC self-rule deals . B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG Director-General B-PER I-PER denied that ministry officials forced anyone to sign any undertaking and insisted that the B-ORG I-ORG has no plans to censor books . " There is no strategy to ban books or to suppress freedom of expression in any form whatsoever , " B-PER told B-ORG . But B-PER said that the absence of relevent legislations may have resulted in some mistakes by some security officials . " This may explain some mistakes against some journalists and writers , " he said . B-PER said books by other authors , including B-MISC Journalist B-PER I-PER , were also banned . He said that security officials often visit his shop to make sure he was not selling the books . " I think this is a bad beginning . If we have confidence , why should we be afraid of the other opinion ? " B-PER said . Thousands of books were banned from sale in the B-LOC I-LOC and B-LOC I-LOC by the B-MISC military authorities before the B-MISC state handed over parts of the two areas to the B-ORG under a self-rule deal in 1994 . B-LOC blames B-LOC control tower for accident . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The chairman of national carrier B-ORG on Thursday blamed the control tower at B-LOC airport for the B-ORG plane accident . Twenty people were injured on Wednesday when the B-ORG B-MISC 707 overshot the runway , caught fire , hit a taxi and skipped across a road onto a railway line . Chairman B-PER I-PER I-PER told a news conference at B-LOC airport : " The control tower should have allocated the plane another runway , instead of the one the plane landed on . " " The one it landed on is 2,250 metres ( 2,460 yards ) long while the other one if more than 3,000 metres ( 3,300 yards ) long and is less steep , " he added . He said a B-MISC civil aviation authority official had made the same point and he noted that a B-MISC plane had a similar accident there in 1994 . The B-ORG pilot blamed B-MISC airport staff for misleading him . The landing took place after a rainstorm . " Its not an accident . It 's very wet . The brake action is very poor and the tower said it 's medium . That 's wrong , " the pilot told private B-ORG news agency in B-MISC . B-LOC wants nothing to do with B-MISC rulers . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-MISC government will have nothing more to do with the B-MISC government because it continues to shelter and support B-MISC militants , President B-PER I-PER said in a speech on Thursday . B-LOC says the B-MISC government helped the B-MISC militants who tried to kill B-PER in B-LOC I-LOC last year . It sponsored last week 's B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG resolution threatening a ban on B-MISC flights abroad if B-LOC does not hand over three men accused in the B-LOC I-LOC incident . The sanctions will come into effect in November if B-LOC fails to extradite the men , but B-LOC says it cannot hand them over to B-LOC for trial because they are not in B-LOC . " We are still eager that nothing should affect the B-MISC people but we will not deal with the current regime or the B-PER front or whatever , " B-PER told a group of academics . B-PER I-PER is the leader of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , the political force behind the B-MISC government . " I do n't want to go into more details than that but there are more details and they are bitter . There are terrorists they are sheltering and they make B-MISC passorts for them and they get paid by them , " B-PER said . He did not say if B-LOC would go so far as to break relations , a step it has been reluctant to take , ostensibly because it would affect ordinary B-MISC . B-MISC shares shed gains in profit-taking . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-MISC shares ended lower on Thursday , shedding gains of earlier in the week amid profit-taking sales , brokers said . The B-MISC lost 0.19 percent or 123.89 points to end at 64,178.78 . Gains so far this week have totalled 2.92 percent . Daily volume dropped to 7.2 trillion lira from Wednesday 's 7.8 trillion lira . " Profit-taking sales in the afternoon showed the latest gains of the index were actually a reaction rise . I expect the market to go as far down as 63,000 tomorrow if sales continue , " said B-PER I-PER from B-ORG . Brokers said profit taking sales had come especially as the index approached the 65,000 resistance level . They said the index could also rise towards 65,000 if the cheap share prices attracted buyers . The market had its first resistance at 67,000 if it pierced 65,000 , they added . The session 's most active shares were those of B-ORG gained 300 lira to 8,600 . Shares of utility B-ORG lost 3,000 lira to 67,000 . The 85-share industrial index lost 0.47 percent to 70,848.86 and the 15-share financial index rose by 0.55 percent to 55,929.89 . B-PER I-PER B-LOC , B-LOC 1996-08-22 A B-LOC court sentenced B-LOC B-MISC leader B-PER I-PER on Thursday to four years in prison for pumping banned extremist propaganda into B-LOC from his base in the B-LOC I-LOC . B-PER , from B-LOC , B-LOC , yelled a tirade of abuse at the court after his conviction for inciting racial hatred . " The struggle will go on , " the 43-year-old shouted in B-MISC before being escorted out by security guards . B-PER 's lawyer vowed he would appeal against the court 's decision , arguing that his client should have been set free because he had not committed any offence under B-MISC law . The B-MISC government hailed the conviction as a major victory in the fight against B-MISC . B-PER 's worldwide network has been the main source of B-MISC propaganda material flowing into B-LOC since the 1970s . " B-PER possessed a well-oiled propaganda machine , honed during more than 20 years , " presiding judge B-PER I-PER told the court . " He set up a propaganda cannon and fired it at B-LOC . " said B-PER , who also read out extracts from B-PER 's material praising B-PER as " the greatest of all leaders " and describing the B-MISC slaughter of millions of B-MISC as a myth . Eager to put B-PER behind bars quickly and avoid a long and complex trial , prosecutor B-PER I-PER limited his charges to offences since 1994 . He had demanded a five-year jail term but said he was satisfied with the court 's sentence . Publishing and distributing B-MISC material is illegal in B-LOC but B-PER 's defence team had argued that B-LOC freedom of speech laws meant he was free to produce his swastika-covered books , magazines , videos and flags in his homeland . Interior Minister B-PER I-PER said in a statement he " welcomed the prosecution and conviction of one of the ringleaders of international B-MISC and biggest distributers of vicious racist publications " . " It is high time he was behind bars , " the opposition B-MISC I-MISC said in a statement . B-PER , dressed in a sober blue suit and sporting his trademark B-MISC black moustache , showed no sign of emotion as B-PER spent more than an hour reading out the verdict and explaining the court 's decision . But as B-PER was about to be led away , he turned to reporters and blurted out a virtually incomprehensible quick-fire diatribe against the court . " Neither the B-MISC I-MISC ( B-MISC ) nor the communists dared to kidnap an B-MISC citizen , " he shouted , in an oblique reference to his extradition to B-LOC from B-LOC . " That 's the truth . " His attorney , B-PER I-PER , told reporters outside the courtroom that the judges had not explained how a B-MISC court could judge someone for actions carried out in the B-LOC I-LOC . B-PER said B-PER was obsessed by B-MISC and devoted his life to leading his B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) , which derives its name from the full B-MISC title of B-PER 's B-MISC party . During the three-month trial , the court dealt mainly with issues of the B-ORG 's " B-ORG I-ORG " ( " B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG " ) magazine , filled with references to B-MISC supremacy and defamatory statements about B-MISC . The court rejected B-PER 's argument that B-PER 's extradition from B-LOC , where he was arrested in March last year at the request of B-MISC authorities , was illegal . B-PER was also convicted of disseminating the symbols of anti-constitutional organisations . He will probably be free in around two and a half years . The court ruled that the 15 months he has spent in custody since his arrest should be subtracted from his prison term . B-ORG official says B-MISC deal will occur " soon " . B-LOC says sees no arms race with B-LOC , B-LOC . B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC said on Thursday that its opposition to a global nuclear test ban treaty did not mean B-LOC I-LOC intended to enter into an arms race with neighbouring B-LOC and B-LOC . Foreign Minister B-PER I-PER was asked at a news conference if B-LOC 's decision to block adoption of the accord in B-LOC would lead to an arms race with B-LOC and B-LOC . " I do n't see that possibility because B-LOC is not entering into any arms race , " he said . " Our not signing a new treaty does not mean we are going in for any new kind of weapons , particularly nuclear . " B-LOC , along with B-LOC , B-LOC , B-LOC and the B-LOC I-LOC , is a declared nuclear power . B-LOC carried out a nuclear test in 1974 but says it has not built the bomb . Experts believe both B-LOC and B-LOC could quickly assemble nuclear weapons . B-PER said he did not expect B-LOC 's veto of the B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC ( B-MISC ) to damage bilateral ties with other nations . " I do not visualise its straining our bilateral relations with any country . The text has already been blocked , " he said . B-PER said B-LOC would re-examine its position if the treaty , particularly a clause providing for its entry into force , was modified . Asked what B-LOC would do if the pact were forwarded to the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , B-PER said : " That bridge I will cross when I come to it . " In a written statement released at the news conference , B-PER reiterated B-LOC 's objections to the treaty , under negotiation at the B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC in B-LOC . " It is a sad fact that the nuclear weapon states show no interest in giving up their nuclear hegemony , " the statement said . B-PER said B-LOC had national security concerns that made it impossible for B-LOC I-LOC to sign the B-MISC . " Our security concerns oblige us to maintain our nuclear option , " he said , adding that B-LOC had exercised restraint in not carrying out any nuclear tests since the country 's lone test blast in 1974 . He said : " We cannot accept constraints on our option as long as nuclear weapon states continue to rely on their nuclear arsenals for their security " . B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG governor B-PER I-PER said on Thursday that he expected the cash reserve ratio ( CRR ) maintained by banks to be reduced over the medium term . " Over the medium term , yes , " he told B-ORG after addressing industrialists in the capital . He denied having said in a recent newspaper interview that the CRR could be raised if necessary . He said he was only trying ( in that newspaper report ) to explain the theoretical position on the use of the CRR by central banks to manage money supply . B-PER explained that the cash reserve ratio was an instrument that central banks could use to regulate money supply by reducing or increasing the ratio . But in the current context , the government stood by an earlier commitment to reduce it over a period of time , he said in response to a question . -- B-LOC I-LOC newsroom , +91-11-3012024 Two pct B-LOC current account deficit viable - B-ORG . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG Governor B-PER I-PER said on Thursday that a current account deficit of two percent of gross domestic product ( GDP ) was sustainable given the currrent rate of growth . " The current account deficit of around two percent of GDP is a sustainable level of deficit given the expected real growth rate and the trends in imports and exports , " B-PER said in an address to business leaders in B-LOC I-LOC . B-PER said a current account deficit of two percent brought about by a 16-17 percent annual growth in exports and a 14-15 percent rise in imports along with an increase in non-debt flows could lead to a reduction in the debt-service ratio to below 20 percent over the next five years . -- B-LOC newsroom +91-22-265 9000 B-PER I-PER devoted to world 's poor . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-PER I-PER , known as the B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER , won the B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC in 1979 for bringing hope and dignity to millions of poor , unwanted people with her simple message : " The poor must know that we love them . " While the world heaps honours on her and even regards her as a living saint , the nun of B-MISC descent maintains she is merely doing B-PER 's work . " It gives me great joy and fulfilment to love and care for the poor and neglected , " she said . " The poor do not need our sympathy and pity . They need our love and compassion . " The diminutive B-MISC I-MISC missionary was on respiratory support in intensive care in an B-MISC nursing home on Thursday after suffering heart failure . But an attending doctor said B-PER I-PER , who turns 86 next Tuesday , was conscious and in stable condition . The task B-PER I-PER began alone in 1949 in the slums of densely-populated B-LOC , and grew to touch the hearts of people around the world . When in 1979 she was told she had won the B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC , she said characteristically : " I am unworthy . " The world disagreed , showering more than 80 national and international honours on her including the B-MISC I-MISC , or B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC , the country 's highest civilian award . Her health began to deteriorate in 1989 when she was fitted with a heart pacemaker . A year later , the B-LOC announced she was stepping down as Superior of her B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG order . More than 100 delegates flew in from around the world to elect a successor . They could not agree , so asked her to stay on . She agreed . In 1991 , B-PER I-PER was treated at a B-LOC hospital for heart disease and bacterial pneumonia . In 1993 , she fell in B-LOC and broke three ribs . In August the same year , while in B-LOC I-LOC to receive yet another award , she developed malaria , complicated by her heart and lung problems . Last April she fractured her left collar bone . But her increasing frailty , arthritis and failing eyesight has not stopped her travels around the world to mingle with the poor and desperate . B-PER I-PER was born B-PER I-PER I-PER to B-MISC parents in B-LOC , in what was then B-LOC , on August 27 , 1910 . She attended a government school and was already deeply religious by the time she was 12 . At the age of 18 she became a B-MISC nun , hoping to work at the Order 's B-LOC mission . She was sent to B-LOC I-LOC in B-LOC and from there to B-LOC to begin her novitiate and teach geography at a convent school in B-LOC . She said her divine call to work among the poor came in September , 1946 . " The message was quite clear , " she told one interviewer . " I was to leave the convent and help the poor while living among them . It was an order . I knew where I belonged . " The B-LOC and the mother superior in B-LOC approved and after intensive training as a nurse with B-MISC missionaries she opened her first B-LOC slum school in December 1949 . She took the name of B-PER , after B-LOC 's Saint B-PER of the Child B-PER . In B-LOC she was simply called B-PER . B-PER I-PER set up her first home for the dying in a B-MISC rest house in B-LOC after she saw a penniless woman turned away by a city hospital . Named " B-LOC I-LOC " ( B-LOC I-LOC ) , it was the first of a chain of 150 homes for dying , destitute people , admitting nearly 18,000 a year . Her B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , a B-MISC I-MISC religious order she founded in 1949 , now runs about 300 homes for unwanted children and the destitute in B-LOC and abroad . In 1994 a B-MISC television documentary called the myth around B-PER I-PER a mixture of " hyperbole and credulity " . B-MISC around the world rose to her defence . B-ORG - FOCUS-News forecasts alien-led profit boost . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-22 Media baron B-PER I-PER 's B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG reported lower than expected 1995/96 profits on Thursday , but forecast that the hit film " B-MISC I-MISC " would help increase profits by at least 20 percent in 1996/97 . " From an earnings perspective , the current fiscal year has begun with great promise due to the hit motion picture ' B-MISC I-MISC , ' " B-ORG I-ORG said in a statement announcing its results for the year to June 30 , 1996 . It said moderating paper prices and solid orders for advertising at its B-ORG I-ORG television network in the B-LOC I-LOC would also help boost profits in the 1996/97 year . " A budgeted profit increase of at least 20 percent for the full year currently appears very attainable , " B-ORG I-ORG said . The bullish comments for the coming year soothed analysts and most shareholders , who were disappointed by the lower than expected profit for 1995/96 . B-ORG announced pre-abnormals net profit for the year fell six percent to B-MISC 1.26 billion ( B-MISC 995 million ) and earnings per share dropped to 40 cents from 46 cents . Analysts had on average expected a pre-abnormals profit of B-MISC 1.343 billion . " The year just gone was disappointing , but the outlook for the current year looks good , " B-ORG I-ORG media analyst B-PER I-PER said . B-ORG I-ORG said strong performances in B-LOC television and B-MISC newspapers were offset by lower profits from B-ORG I-ORG 's magazine and publishing divisions and further hefty losses from its B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG operations . Higher newsprint prices hit profits hard . " Throughout the group , higher paper prices increased costs by over B-MISC 300 million , " it said . B-ORG I-ORG said B-MISC newspaper operating profits rose 10 percent for the year , as higher cover prices at B-ORG I-ORG and B-ORG I-ORG and higher advertising volumes offset increased newsprint costs . Advertising revenues at B-ORG I-ORG grew 20 percent . Analysts said sharply lower earnings from B-ORG I-ORG 's book publishing division and its B-LOC magazines had been the major surprises in the results for 1995/96 . B-ORG I-ORG said revenue gains at its magazines and inserts division were offset by higher paper prices and lower sales at the B-LOC B-ORG I-ORG . B-ORG said dramatically lower earnings from the B-MISC arm of its B-ORG publishing division more than offset healthy results from its B-LOC operation . It said the demise of the B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC had hurt the B-MISC operations , and weak performances from the B-LOC I-LOC unit of B-ORG had not helped . The minimum price setting expired last September when three publishers pulled out . But it was the bullish profit forecast for 1996/97 that took the spotlight in the market , with some analysts saying 20 percent may even be an understatement . " If they 're saying at least 20 percent , then their internal forecasts are probably saying 25 or 30 percent , " said one B-LOC media analyst who declined to be named . B-ORG I-ORG 's shares were down eight cents at B-MISC 6.39 at 2.00 p.m. ( 0400 B-MISC ) in a soft market . ( B-MISC 1 = B-MISC 0.79 ) -- B-ORG I-ORG 61-2 373-1800 B-ORG - Budget cuts to boost B-LOC savings - B-ORG . B-LOC 1996-08-22 The B-MISC government 's plans to slash its budget deficit should make a useful contribution to national savings , the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG ( B-ORG ) said in its annual report . " The government 's announced plans to balance the budget , if realised , would make a useful contribution to raising national savings , " the B-ORG said . The bank said there were concerns fiscal consolidation would unduly restrict growth , but evidence was ambiguous . In its 1996/97 budget announced on Tuesday , the B-MISC B-ORG government announced an underlying budget deficit of B-MISC 5.65 billion , and pledged to return the underlying budget balance to surplus by 1998/99 . The budget deficit was B-MISC 10.3 billion in 1995/96 . -- B-ORG I-ORG 61-2 9373-1800 " Determined and credible efforts to rein in unsustainable fiscal positions ( are ) often rewarded by rising confidence , giving favourable effects on economic activity even in the short term , " it said . " More generally , the long-term effects of fiscal consolidation are clearly positive , with higher saving tending to promote economic growth by raising investment and lowering long-term real interest rates , " the B-ORG said . B-LOC 1996-08-22 B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG said on Thursday that the Optimised Deprival Value ( ODV ) of its network at March 31 , 1996 has been set at $ 524.2 million , an increase of eight percent on its $ 486.5 million valuation a year earlier . The company said the increase reflected the value of extensions to the network to meet economic growth in its supply area and an increase in the estimated lifespan of the network . It said the increase was consistent with the approach followed by other power companies and reflected the company 's new levels of preventative maintenance and equipment upgrading . The revaluation was undertaken to meet the disclosure requirements of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG . -- B-LOC newsroom 64 4 4734 746 Thais hunt for B-MISC jail breaker . B-LOC B-LOC has launched a manhunt for an B-MISC who escaped from a high security prison in B-LOC while awaiting trial on drug possession charges , officials said on Thursday . B-PER I-PER , 46 , from B-LOC , made the first sucessful escape from B-LOC prison in the northern outskirts of the capital on Sunday night . He was believed by prison officials to still be in B-LOC . " We have ordered a massive hunt for him and I am quite confident we will get him soon , " B-PER I-PER , deputy director general of the B-ORG I-ORG , told B-ORG . B-PER , arrested in December 1993 and charged with heroin trafficking , sawed the iron grill off his cell window and climbed down the prison 's five-metre ( 15-foot ) wall on a rope made from bed sheets , Vivit said . The corrections department was probing the escape and had ordered all foreign inmates chained to prevent more breakouts . There are 266 B-MISC , including six B-MISC , in the prison , most awaiting trial on drugs charges . There also are about 5,000 B-MISC inmates in B-LOC , a prison official said . B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 B-LOC has banned the use of nitrofuran , an antibiotic , in chicken feed and veterinary applications because it believes the drug could cause cancer , the health ministry said on Thursday . " It is hoped that livestock breeders and feedmillers will abide by the laws and respect the cabinet decision in the interest of consumer safety , " Health Minister B-PER I-PER Meng was quoted as saying by the national B-ORG news agency . B-PER said offenders could face a two-year prison sentence and a maximum fine of 5,000 ringgit ( $ 2000 ) . " The ban takes effect immediately , " he added . B-PER I-PER B-LOC 1996-08-23 B-LOC celebrates five years of independence from B-LOC rule on Saturday , hailing civil and inter-ethnic peace as its main B-MISC achievement . B-LOC 's declaration of independence in 1991 , backed nine-to-one by a referendum in December of that year , effectively dealt a death blow to the B-MISC empire and ended more than three centuries of rule from B-LOC . B-LOC , with a B-MISC community of 11 million people -- the world 's largest outside B-LOC -- has avoided conflicts like those in B-LOC 's B-LOC , neighbouring B-LOC , and the former B-MISC republics of B-LOC , B-LOC and B-LOC . " B-LOC 's biggest achievements for five years are the preservation of civil peace and inter-ethnic harmony , " President B-PER I-PER said in televised statement this week . " Unlike many other B-MISC countries we were able to deal with conflict situations in a peaceful and civilised way . " But independence was initially accompanied by hyper-inflation and economic collapse , although there are signs of a turnaround . Inflation -- a hyper-inflationary 10,300 percent a year in 1993 -- was a respectable 0.1 percent a month in June and July and the economy has just begun to grow . B-PER told a solemn ceremony at the B-LOC I-LOC on Friday that " there was a turning point " in reforms and that he expected a rise in the standard of living in the near future . " There is no doubt that economic growth has already started , " said B-PER I-PER , head of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG 's mission in B-LOC . " The national bank and the government have every reason to be proud of their efforts . " Central bank officials said on Thursday that a much-postponed hryvna currency would " definitely " be introduced before the end of this year . It will replace the interim karbovanets currency , which was introduced at par to the B-MISC rouble in 1992 but now trades at almost 33 karbovanets per rouble . B-LOC has repeatedly promised to introduce the hryvna but had to postpone the plans because of economic problems . Proud of its record in promptly joining both the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG and B-ORG 's B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC , B-LOC caused a foreign policy wrangle this week , offending B-LOC by allowing a B-MISC minister to appear on a public , if unofficial visit . B-LOC cancelled a visit by a top-level delegation in protest . B-LOC 's Foreign Minister B-PER I-PER said B-LOC was overreacting . But B-LOC , seeing itself as a bridge between B-LOC and the rapidly B-MISC countries of eastern B-LOC , is looking West as well as East . " The strategic aim of B-MISC integration should not in any way damage B-LOC 's interests in B-MISC areas . Relations with B-LOC , which is our main partner , have great importance , " B-PER said . " But B-LOC cannot be economically oriented on B-LOC , even though those in some circles push us to do that . " B-PER has said B-LOC wants membership of the B-ORG I-ORG , associate membership of the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG defence grouping and to move closer to B-ORG . A message from the West this week from B-LOC President B-PER I-PER congratulated B-LOC on the anniversary , promising to support market reforms and praising B-LOC as a " stabilising factor " in a united B-LOC . Oldest B-LOC book disappears from B-LOC - paper . B-LOC 1996-08-23 A 16th-century document , the earliest complete example of written B-MISC , has disappeared from the B-LOC archives , an B-MISC newspaper said on Friday . B-ORG I-ORG said the " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC ' , by B-PER I-PER , dating from 1555 and discovered in 1740 in a religious seminary in B-LOC , was the first major document published in the B-MISC language . " We B-MISC , sons of B-MISC , believed our language had a written document but now we do not have it any more , " lamented scholar B-PER I-PER , told of the loss by the B-LOC library . B-LOC 's national library has three copies of the " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC ' . " There is nothing left for us but to be grateful to civilisation for inventing photocopies , " B-ORG I-ORG said . B-LOC to clamp down on barter deals . B-LOC 1996-08-23 B-MISC officials , keen to cut capital flight , will adopt tight measures to cut barter deals in foreign trade to a minimum , a customs official said on Friday . " We have always been concerned about barter deals with other countries , viewing them as a disguised kind of capital flight from B-LOC , " B-PER I-PER , deputy head of the currency department at the B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG , told B-ORG . B-PER said last year goods had been exported under many B-MISC barter deals , with nothing imported in return . She said the cost of such unimported goods was $ 1.10 billion in 1995 . Barter deals were worth $ 4.9 billion last year , or about eight percent of all B-MISC exports estimated at $ 61.5 billion , she said . " The cost of exported goods is too often understated , so the actual share of barter deals in B-MISC exports and the amount of unimported goods may be even higher , " B-PER said . A few days ago B-MISC President B-PER I-PER issued a decree on state regulation of foreign barter deals , and B-PER said this " could substantially improve the situation " . In line with the decree , which will come into force on November 1 , all B-MISC barter traders will be obliged to import goods worth the cost of their exports within 180 days . " If traders are late , they will have to pay fines worth the cost of their exported goods , " B-PER said . Understating the cost of exported goods could still be a loophole for barter dealers , but B-PER said the authorities are currently " tackling the technicalities of the issue " . Barter has always been a feature of the B-LOC I-LOC 's foreign trade , but B-PER 's decrees liberalising foreign trade in 1991-1992 has given barter a new impetus . A few years ago , barter deals accounted for up to 25-30 percent of B-MISC exports because " thousands ( of ) trade companies which popped up preferred barter in the absence of reliable B-MISC banks and money transfer systems " , B-PER said . " Now many B-MISC banks are strong and can make various sorts of money tranfers , while incompetent traders are being ousted by more experienced ones . But the current share of barter deals in B-MISC exports is still high , " she said . -- B-PER I-PER , B-ORG I-ORG , +7095 941 8520 B-ORG plans " B-MISC " sequel - report . B-LOC I-LOC 1996-08-22 B-ORG I-ORG is going ahead with a sequel to the B-PER I-PER blockbuster , " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC " and hopes to release it in the summer of 1998 , B-ORG I-ORG reported in its Friday edition . The big-screen version of the spy TV series has grossed $ 175 million domestically since opening May 22 , and $ 338 million overseas so far . It 's the biggest success for B-MISC I-MISC B-ORG since 1994 's " B-MISC I-MISC " . However , many critics complained its plot was incomprehensible . B-PER will reprise his roles as star and co-producer , and will soon meet B-MISC I-MISC screenwriter B-PER I-PER , who will write the script , the report said . It said " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC " director B-PER I-PER I-PER would have first crack at the sequel , though no deals have been made yet . B-PER , whose B-MISC were for " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC " and " B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC " , earlier this summer criticised some of the season 's blockbusters . B-LOC 1996-08-23 B-LOC batsman B-PER I-PER was forced to endure a frustrating delay of over three hours before resuming his quest for a maiden test century in the third test against B-LOC on Friday . Heavy overnight rain and morning drizzle ruled out any play before lunch on the second day but an improvement in the weather prompted the umpires to announce a 1415 local time ( 1315 B-MISC ) start in the event of no further rain . B-PER , unbeaten on 94 overnight in an B-LOC total of 278 for six , was spotted strumming a guitar in the dressing-room as the B-LOC ground staff took centre stage . There were several damp patches on the square and the outfield and it was still raining when the players took an early lunch at 1230 local time ( 1130 B-MISC ) . When brighter weather finally arrived , the umpires announced a revised figure of 67 overs to be bowled with play extended to at least 1900 local time ( 1800 B-MISC ) .
